name: Rosh Online: The Return of Karos
name_original: Rosh Online: The Return of Karos
description:
Rosh Online: The Return of Karos is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by GalaxyGate. It came out on 07-12-2012. It was published by Ignited Games. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Rosh Online: The Return of Karos is available on PC.
